alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 6:52PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A line of showers containing hail will impact portions of central Humboldt and northwestern Trinity Counties through 730 PM PST... At 649 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking showers containing hail along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Trinidad to 18 miles west of McKinleyville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Slick driving conditions are possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Arcata, Willow Creek, Fortuna, Trinidad, McKinleyville, Maple Creek, Westhaven-Moonstone, Ferndale, Blue Lake, Myrtletown, Cutten, Fairhaven, Humboldt Hill, Freshwater, Kneeland, Arcata Arpt, Loleta, Fieldbrook and Pine Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and be prepared for slick road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior
